answers.author: Toni Shope
answers.text:
Hi.  You might want to check with Nashville-Davidson County, TN Government, Sunnyvale, CA and Concord, CA.

author: Melisa Caughman
text: We have been asked about the possibility of continuing employee benefits, in our case health insurance, to Council members once they have left office. Would anyone share their ordinances or policies that are related to this practice? Thanks!
title: Benefits for Elected Officials at the end of their term
